channel.title: 20th-Anniversary IPhone on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in 20th-Anniversary IPhone on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: iOS 26 Liquid Glass Design Could Signal Future Bezel-Free iPhone
item.description: Apple’s divisive new Liquid Glass design language in iOS 26 could be hinting at a major hardware redesign coming to future iPhones, reckons veteran app developer Craig Hockenberry of The Iconfactory.

item.title: iOS 26 Liquid Glass Design Could Signal Future Bezel-Free iPhone
